extendedInfo.description: The Best Hypnosis & Self Development Programmes.70 plus Free Hypnosis and Coaching audio titles - including Joseph's 11 lesson (8hr) Confidence Programme.5 Star - "I've downloaded apps on getting over ur ex and managing anger and they have both helped me... It makes life easier for me"5 Star - "Life Saver Joseph is a God send, I have struggled my whole life with Anxiety & Self Confidence issues, so I downloaded a few of His MP3's & WOW what a change"5 Star - "So much better than other hypnosis apps on the Market, this is simple and has so much choice. There's more than enough free content to keep me happy as well as paid sessions on several subjects, that cost less than my morning coffee. It's a free app, and the amount of free content makes it more than worth the download"5 Star - "I have tried many different hypno apps and this for me is a clear winner well done Joseph 5 Star - "Fabulous, really works! Thanks Joseph!:-)"5 Star - "Brilliant. Very helpful Mp3s. Great for relaxation and other issues. Gets you thinking differently. 10 out of 10"5 Star - "Fantastic app take JC with you everywhere. 20-30 min on the train or bus listening to this stuff can set you up for the day or put things into perspective going home. Brilliant stuff"5 Star - "Very useful. Impressed with the personal service from Joseph himself!"5 Star - "This app is brill just when u think there is no help u turn round and there is thank" 5 Star - "I appreciate everything that Joseph does! Its helping me soo much!!"5 Star - "works well, and when it doesn't the people behind it are right there with you to make out work. good customer service and quality scripts I've already bought 3 tracksSince being injured on duty whilst serving as a Police Officer I have suffered from numerous physical injuries and chronic pain in addition I suffer from Chronic PTSD. When many doctors gave up I started looking at Hypnotherapy. I came across Joseph Clough, I now use his self hypnosis products which have helped me improve my standard of life. His Products are made to a very high standard and his technique will help you to achieve what you decide to set your goals as whether it is Personal Development or working on an area of your life to help improve your quality of life. You can save a lot of time having to look at other products online and in this App Market (Many that are very poor quality) by downloading this Joseph Clough App and start improving what ever area of your life you desire. Dr Nic Castle"5 Star - "I listen to this app everynight and my performance in making money has increase. Thanks . And no they are not over priced. You just must be broke"5 Star - "I find this to be soothing, motivating, inspiring, etc. depending on what recording I use. All the free content has been of such fantastic quality. Most free hypnosis mp3's are short, leave you wanting more and are just a trailer to get you to buy the full recording. These are high quality. I really enjoy this site and get alot out of it"Free Hypnosis/Hypnotherapy MP3 downloads by Celebrity Hypnotherapist, Author, Coach, Trainer and Hay House Author Joseph Clough.

reviews.title: Great app!! Love how he helps people & very inspiring!!!
reviews.comment: Very helpful & great app & really helps people be their best!!!
reviews.author: Joseph Graves

reviews.title: Simply the BEST
reviews.comment: This is the 1st app ive downloaded and tried.But kept coming back as this is the BEST among the rest.I\'m sooi thankful to no end to Mr. JC as he brings out the best in me and had changed my outview in life.Recommended!
reviews.author: Jona Marie Mercado

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Sincerely, if you are willing to have an open mind and listen, this will change you in a powerful and dramatic way! I highly recommend!!!
reviews.author: Alastair Rear

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Very relaxing. Good for motivation and meditation. Would recommend you give it a listen.
reviews.author: KC Knight

reviews.title: Joseph is Excellent
reviews.comment: I enjoy Joseph\'s work. He is very honest about his own life experience, how he has overcome certain challenges along the way, and how these tools can help you.  I love this app and used it often.  Thanks again Joseph!  :)
reviews.author: Jeannine Vegas

reviews.title: Joseph Clough Hypnosis
reviews.comment: Helps me in so many ways! I\'ve come to rely on listening to Joseph EVERY night......can\'t say enough good things about his ability to really connect with the listener. He truly wants to better peoples lives!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boo
reviews.comment: I paid $3 for a session and have tried 4 times to listen to it. It cuts off EVERY TIME.
reviews.author: Casey Eichinger

reviews.title: Good free content
reviews.comment: This app includes lots of free material for anything you can think. I\'ve only given it 4 because the jury is still out on whether any of it works. That said some people are more susceptible to hypnosis than others.
reviews.author: Stephen Towson

reviews.title: I cant sleep
reviews.comment: I can\'t fall asleep, the very same thing I want to cure \"anxeity\" keeps me from falling asleep. Sucks :(
reviews.author: Juan Salazar

reviews.comment: Had to uninstall coz nothing would play anymore :( the app is amazing when it works
reviews.author: paige goldsborough

reviews.title: GENIUS
reviews.comment: Totally love this app. Lots of free hypnosis. I have also bought some of the other apps that you can add on. Choose which areas you need help with.
reviews.author: Sarah Shepherd

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love this app, I had it on my iphone and when I got my GS3 it was the first app I downloaded. Listening to Joseph helps me relax and a never have a problem getting to sleep while listening to his hypnosis tracks. Keep up the great work,  you are helping so many people!
reviews.author: Jess G

reviews.title: THE BEST EVER!!!
reviews.comment: Joseph Clough is the best. I feel wonderful after listening to him. So soothing and calm. No one can beat his sessions by far.
reviews.author: LORI K

reviews.title: Honestly. Amazing
reviews.comment: He \"really does respond BK.\" Very polite & Helpful. A Genuine Person Considerate of the well-being of others. NO GIMMICKS THAT\'S WHAT MAKES IT EVEN MORE AWESOME.
reviews.author: Irene Pettit

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Best app ever and JC\'s voice is calming and sexy and it feels like is talking to you so it makes it feel more personable. 2 thumbs up
reviews.author: Nikole Philabaum

reviews.title: Love J.C.
reviews.comment: Most excellent hypnosis and self help app I\'ve found. Very relaxing. Very insightful. Highly recommend.
reviews.author: Tonia DeBlieux

reviews.title: Insightful!
reviews.comment: Through the use of his understanding of the human mind, Joseph Clough provides helpful and useful information via this app. His book, Be Your Potential, has been encouraging and works well in conjunction with this app. He has helped make a difference in me. My sincere gratitude....Miche\'le.
reviews.author: Michele Valcourt

reviews.title: Brilliant.
reviews.comment: Keep up the great work, joseph.... :-)
reviews.author: Hayley Nelis

reviews.title: Works great.
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe how well this app works!  One weird thing is that, ever since I started using this, I often wake up tired with dirt on my feet, scratches all over my arms, and blood on my hands and face. Also, there\'s an unsettling number of strange pet collars in my garage, but I don\'t own a dog or cat. Is this normal?  Anyway, love the app! Thanks.
reviews.author: Sean Scott

reviews.title: Brilliant application
reviews.comment: Excellent voice superb music and so many generous free tracts. Highly recommended. Even the paid tracts are excellent value for money
reviews.author: Khattar Haddadin
